data.text:
I have been privileged to appear as a medical expert on TV stations across the country. In addition to the COVID-19 pandemic, I offer tips on topics like sleep, exercise, nutrition, aging and longevity, women’s health, kids’ health, mental health and much more.

For the last two years, I have served as the medical expert for ABC News 4 and FOX 24 here in Charleston, South Carolina.

This is a list of the TV appearances I have made in recent years. Please feel free to click the links to watch the interviews.

If you are a journalist, show host, or producer, click here to contact me for an interview. Or you can email me at media@drdavidgeier.com and I will respond directly as soon as possible.
